mapper.insert: insert into ideal_selection (title, body, file_path, sub_count, creator_id, update_time) values (#{title}, #{body}, #{filePath}, #{subCount}, #{creator.id}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT selection.id AS id, selection.title AS title, selection.body AS body, selection.file_path AS filePath, selection.sub_count AS subCount, selection.creator_id AS creatorId, selection.update_time AS updateTime, ideal.id AS idealList_id, ideal.ideal_name AS idealList_idealName, ideal.win_count AS idealList_winCount, ideal.final_win_count AS idealList_finalWinCount, ideal.battle_count AS idealList_battleCount, reply.id AS replyList_id, reply.comment AS replyList_comment, reply.author_id AS replyList_authorId, reply.author_name AS replyList_authorName, reply.update_time AS replyList_updateTime, user.id AS creator_id, user.user_id AS creator_userId, user.password AS creator_password, user.user_name AS creator_userName FROM ideal_selection selection LEFT JOIN ideal ideal ON selection.id = ideal.selection_id LEFT JOIN reply reply ON selection.id = reply.selection_id LEFT JOIN user user ON selection.creator_id = user.id WHERE selection.id = #{id}

SELECT selection.id AS id, selection.title AS title, selection.body AS body, selection.file_path AS filePath, selection.sub_count AS subCount, selection.creator_id AS creatorId, selection.update_time AS updateTime, ideal.id AS idealList_id, ideal.ideal_name AS idealList_idealName, ideal.final_win_count AS idealList_finalWinCount, ideal.battle_count AS idealList_battleCount, ideal.win_count AS idealList_winCount, user.id AS creator_id, user.user_id AS creator_userId, user.password AS creator_password, user.user_name AS creator_userName FROM ideal_selection selection LEFT JOIN ideal ideal ON selection.id = ideal.selection_id LEFT JOIN user user ON selection.creator_id = user.id WHERE selection.id in ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM ideal_selection WHERE creator_id = #{creatorId} limit #{pageNum}, 100 ) AS creator_id );
